wikipedia_page.main: Reginald Hackforth  (17 August 1887 – 6 May 1957) was an English classical scholar, known mainly for his work on Plato, and from 1939 to 1952 was the second Laurence Professor of Ancient Philosophy at Cambridge University.

response: * Reginald Hackforth, classical scholar and translator of Phaedrus
